summary: This video presents 10 facts about ancient Egypt, featuring animated cats and dogs in various historical settings. It highlights that mammoths were alive when the pyramids were built, beer was used as payment, harming cats was punishable by death, surgeons drilled into skulls, Cleopatra was of Greek descent, camels were not ridden, pyramids were built by paid workers, Cleopatra lived closer in time to the iPhone than to the pyramids, workers could be excused for brewing beer, and Egyptians mummified animals including crocodiles.
